topic_or_construct: spontaneous belief updating amid spatial uncertainty
justification: "We recently developed an eye-tracking paradigm for measuring spontaneous belief updating amid spatial uncertainty via predictive gaze (Bakst & McGuire, 2021)."

topic_or_construct: predictive belief about upcoming digit location
measured_by: gaze position at the moment of digit onset
justification: "we used gaze position at the time of digit appearance as an indication of the participant's prediction."

measured_by: gaze-based prediction update divided by gaze-based prediction error
justification: "Per-trial learning rate was empirically estimated as the gaze-based prediction update (from trial t to t+1) expressed as a proportion of the gaze-based prediction error (on trial t)."

measured_by: change in median extreme-event learning rate between Early and Late epochs (ΔLR)
justification: "We quantified the amount of metalearning as the change in learning rate for extreme events (ΔLR) over the course of the task (Figure 3D)."
